title: CustomApplicationRecord
description: This is a record type intended to credentials secrets and tokens within PrivCloud. This example is to show what it looks like to define a PII record type in PrivCloud. All record types in PrivCloud follow the JSON Schema specification (https://json-schema.org). More examples can be found on the PrivCloud GitHub site and here @ https://json-schema.org/learn/miscellaneous-examples.html

secretURL.description: The URL associated with the secret, possibly to a user portal.

secretType.comment: By default, all records in PrivCloud are encrypted. Use 'encrypt': false to store the data in PrivCloud unencrypted. This is useful for searching and reporting.

secretAccessToken.description: A token that can be used to access the secret.
